## Properties

| Property    | Attribute   | Description                                                     | Type     | Default                                            |
| ----------- | ----------- | --------------------------------------------------------------- | -------- | -------------------------------------------------- |
| `header`    | `header`    | Header for image for side menu items that are 'user-profile'    | `string` | `''`                                               |
| `image`     | `image`     | Image for side menu items that are 'user-profile'               | `string` | `'https://www.svgrepo.com/show/170303/avatar.svg'` |
| `imageAlt`  | `image-alt` | Alt for image for side menu items that are 'user-profile'       | `string` | `''`                                               |
| `subheader` | `subheader` | Subheader for image for side menu items that are 'user-profile' | `string` | `''`                                               |
